about.summary: Version of the glob module that supports recursion via **, and can capture patterns.

name: glob2
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "glob2" %}
{% set version = "0.5" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/miracle2k/python-glob2/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dea12519a27949c2aa3a14f557d08847debfeae0be58e29391ee1d9ceed80174

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - glob2

about:
  home: https://github.com/miracle2k/python-glob2
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Version of the glob module that supports recursion via **, and can capture patterns.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dfroger
